revision.text:
{{DISPLAYTITLE:A_M_FireRailgun}} '''A_M_FireRailgun'''
(no parameters)
Does nothing if the calling actor has no valid target. Otherwise, calls [[A_MonsterRail]], then sets the calling actor's special1 field to current tic + 50. This codepointer is restricted to {{Class|ScriptedMarine}} and derived classes. [[Category:Decorate Doom functions]] [[Category:Decorate Classic attack functions]] [[Category:Decorate Restricted functions]]{{DEFAULTSORT:M_FireRailgun}}
